creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by the artist with the assistance of Keiko Gallery
description: red lacquered leaf form with trailing silver dot design beginning at bottom; patterned metal on back; small angled metal tube for mounting
markings: seal on back of leaf, near base; label on back of leaf with English and Japanese characters, held on with tape
medium: Lacquer, hemp cloth, wood, and metal
signed: date near bottom of leaf on back, in red pigment: [\'09]
title: Wing of Foliage #32
